name: PostBuildCleanup
description: Cleans the build directories on the agent after the build has finished.
author: Microsoft Premier Services

inputs.name: disableCertCheck
inputs.label: Disable NodeJS certificate check
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this option if your Team Foundation Server is configured with a self-signed or corporate SSL certificate. [[Docs]](https://github.com/almtcger/VstsExtensions/blob/master/PostBuildCleanup/en-US/overview.md#noCertCheck)

messages.NotLastTask: The cleanup task is not the last task in the build. Cleanup will be skipped!
messages.NoCleanup: The build's clean option is disabled. Nothing to clean up.
messages.CleanupSkipped: Skipping cleanup due to wrong task position
messages.UnsupportedRepo: Unsupported version control repository. Currently supported: Git, GitHub, TFVC
messages.WaitForTaskCompletion: Waiting for previous tasks to upload information...
messages.WaitForTaskTimeout: Previous build steps did not finish within the maximum wait time.
messages.DoNotDisableNodeJsCertCheck: The current agent supports custom CA certificates through the NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS variable. Please use this variable instead of disabling the certificate check!
